definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: It's necessary for us to net the currant bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我们有必要用网盖上红醋栗树。

sentences.english: There'sno need for that kind of language in this magazine .
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志没必要出现那种语言。

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些辩解在当时却具有必要的意义。

sentences.english: Don't leave the engine to warm up in winter; you're burning petrol unnecessarily.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的时候，不要让引擎空转，这是在不必要地费油。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他不能毫无必要地娶那个老女人。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to improve the current navigation means of the subsonic vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要对亚音速飞行器的导航方案进行改进。

sentences.english: Be thou faithful until death: and I will give thee the crown of life.
sentences.chinese: 你应当忠信至死，我必要赐给你生命的华冠。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on port-city relation is extremely essential.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究港城关系是十分必要的。

sentences.english: It is not cogitation; it is a waste of life.
sentences.chinese: 其实没必要想那么多，那只是在浪费生命。

sentences.english: Your joke spared her needless embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 你的笑话解除了她不必要的焦虑。

sentences.english: " Gentling " means training it to except accept the human attention need it needed for care and gloomygrooming.
sentences.chinese: “驯化”意味着训练他们接受人类必要的照顾与护理。

sentences.english: Theresult, he said, wouldbe unnecessary volatility.
sentences.chinese: 他说，这样做会导致不必要的波动。

sentences.english: Within the informal work method of RUP, this is often unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 在RUP方法的正式工作中，这常常是不必要的。

sentences.english: You shouldn't have to do those things, the phone should just work.
sentences.chinese: 你没必要做那些事情，那是手机本身就应该搞定的。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建设和谐社会，尽量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平稳定是本地区各国发展的必要条件。
